ABOUTINFO1: The entertainment industry in recent years has had a rapid development, advances in science and technology have given a solid base for many fields among them the beautiful arts have become widespread in all social strata.Given that places such as cinemas, due to their great diffusion and influx has become the meeting point for family, friends and casual, it is necessary to improve and systematize care for users, improving the experience and agility in the provision of services.
ABOUTINFO2: For this reason, the implementation of a system that allows the management and administration for Cinema Rock has been proposed, which incorporates the management of technological tools that improve the experience, control and treatment of information, thus capturing and improving user loyalty.
¿Por qué es bueno tener mi tarjeta premi: Why is it good to have my Cinema Rock premium card?
¿Que requisitos debo tener para obtener: What requirements must I have to obtain my  Cinema Rock premium card?
La tarjeta Premium CineMintic2022 le per: The Premium CineMintic2022 card allows our users to receive benefits in our services such as tickets to our functions with prices lower than those sold to the normal public, discounts on the purchase of confectionery (without exceptions of products, tickets and free food on birthday and other services. For more information visit our Premium Card section:
Debes ser mayor de edad (18 años) y real: You must be of legal age (18 years old) and make the purchase of your card which will be linked by means of a code to your account and ready you can enjoy all the benefits that we have prepared for you.
En nuestro cine manejamos funciones unic: In our cinema we handle unique functions, so the functions you see on our page will be the only ones that will be presented. Check the billboard section to see our functions:
Queremos darle lo mejor a nuestros clien: We want to give our clients the best, so we project the best and most recent movies, so that our clients not only feel satisfied with our services but also with the movies they can watch. Check the billboard section to see our functions:
PARA NOSOTROS ES MUY IMPORTANTE TU OPINI: YOUR OPINION IS VERY IMPORTANT TO US
A continuación digita todos los campos y: Next, type all the fields and we will send your question, complaint or claim, we will answer you as quickly as possible and we will take it into account in our improvement plans in order to always give you the best service.
InformacionDePago: Remember that all your transactions are secure. Choose the method that best suits your needs
Tarjetas: You can pay with your credit card, debit card or cash payments. We handle the following means:
Bancos: Make your payment directly into our bank account by transfer or consignment. Your order will not be processed until the amount has been received in our account.
